links.label: uPortal-app-framework documentation
links.description: MyUW apps are built upon the uPortal-app-framework. Its documentation includes best practices and implementation info about project configuration, access control, in-app messaging, and more.

links.label: AngularJS Material documentation
links.description: All of the CSS classes and directives in AngularJS Material are available for you to use.

links.label: AngularJS Material layout directives
links.description: Using these directives can help you prototype faster by eliminating dependence on additional third-party libraries and custom CSS.

links.label: Material icons
links.description: See all the Material Design icons at your disposal.

links.label: John Papa angularJS style guide
links.description: Though we do not strictly conform to John Papa's code standards, the uPortal-app-framework team strives to do so whenever possible.
